description:
New playable characters, Thief Panther and Black Samurai, will be released!

Each has its own unique capabilities and offers a new style of play.

・Thief Panther
With their quick movements and high evasive ability, they are able to attack precisely while dodging enemy attacks.

・Black Samurai
It boasts powerful attacks that knock down the enemy.
There is an exhilaration that I have not felt with other characters.

This DLC offers a new player experience and a greater variety of combat.
We invite you to try a new adventure with Thief Panther and Black Samurai!
name: XALADIA: Rise of the Space Pirates X2 - Playable Character Pack
